# Berner Oberland

The Bernese Oberland, sometimes also known as the Bernese Highlands, is the highest and southernmost part of the canton of Bern.

## Highest peaks
***These are the 10 highest peaks of the Bernese Highlands in meters***\
1.	Finsteraarhorn	4274	 
2.	Aletschhorn	4194	 
3.	Jungfrau	4159	 
4.	Mönch	4110 
5.	Schreckhorn	4078
6.	Grosses Fiescherhorn	 
7.	Grosses Grünhorn
8.	Lauteraarhorn	4042
9.	Hinter-Fiescherhorn	4025
10.	Gletscherhorn	3983

### Starting points for hiking tours
- Lauterbrunnen
- Grindelwald
- Interlaken
- Andelboden
- Brienz
